name: WORT
description:
Made for WOWIE Jam #3 in 3 days!

Firefox seems to be the most stable.

Wort is a little slimeball  trying to get to the Mystical Mush Room, but the way is paved with hazards. Luckily for Wort, what kills it, makes it stronger!

Dying by environmental hazards gives Wort two powers, one to affect him and one to affect the environment.

If you get stuck, you Wort can always kill itself.

The game can be played with a keyboard or gamepad, the latter is recommended for a better experience!

This could not have been possible without the talented IcyWebs, who did all the artwork for the game. Show her some love and go watch her do pixel art on Twitch!
